title: Οι Αυθαίρετοι
overview: Arbitrary coexistence! Arbitrary humor! Arbitrary laugh! A turn became - arbitrarily - great success! Can you imagine two families with the same name, which can stay in the same building, but their members have the slightest family relationship between them? "Why not, it is a pure coincidence", is the first thing that comes to mind. What would we think, but if you say that the head of one is a failed lawyer, married with a rich woman while taking care of the second is a self-made restaurateur, who has an indescribably xenomania daughter? "They happen they" can you answer. Yes, they happen! As two occupants often be found in knives and wants to devour each other. Taken together, however, they are unlikely to coexist, because then ginetai..to come to see.
